name: Bluelupin Technologies
description:
Bluelupin Technologies is arguably best platform based mobile and web application developer in India. Our award winning platform MobileKonnect is a proof of our expertise in mobile and web apps development. We are in Top 20 Enterprise Mobile Solution Developer by CIO magazine. We are serving most reputed as well as fast growing startups. 
Our Services:
    - Product Conceptulization
    - Mobile Development on native iOS/Android/Windows, Xamarin, React Native, Ionic
    - Web Development on ASP.NET MVC, .NET Core, Laravel, Angular 4, Vue 2, React
    - Cloud Expertise on Azure, AWS, Digital Ocean, Google Clouds
    - User Interface and User Experience Design
    - E-commerce and marketing websites using WordPress, Magento and Pagekit
    - DevOps and Automation with Ansible, Python, Perl, Bash, Powershell
    - Database Expertise on MS SQL Server, MySQL, MongoDB
Solutions: 

    - MobileKonnect - Cost effective native iOS and Android App management solution
    - PushKonnect - Unified user notification platform
    - MillPond - High performance managed WordPress Hosting
    - SwiftDesk - Easy to use, first SPA based, mobile integrated, Helpdesk system
